profile:
RESIDENTIAL & COMMERCIAL CUSTOM WINDOW COVERINGS - Your one-stop-shop for custom window coverings

Give a new life to your windows
Whether youâ€™re updating your decor or fitting out a brand new home let Shades4u provide the finishing touches and designer flair with their stunning range of custom-made window coverings. No matter how big your windows or doors, or what shape, Shades4u can custom make your window coverings for a perfect fit, every time.

Free Consultation & Free Installation
We come to your home with our blinds and samples so that you can mix and match your new blinds to complement your home and make an informed decision.

Professional Service
We ensure that our service will always cater to all of your hopes and expectations, so that they are not only met, but exceeded beyond anything throughout the entire process.

Quality Products
We set quality standards within the window coverings industry. We diligently perform more tests and checks to ensure our products withstand the demands of everyday use.

SHADES
Duo-Glide (Zebra Blinds) - Twin Shades - Solar Shades - Sheer Shades - Roller Shades - Natural Shades and Drapes - Cellular Shades 

BLINDS 
Vertical Blinds - Horizontal Blinds - Fauxwood and composite blinds - Wood Blinds

SHUTTERS
Wood Shutters - Composite Shutters


LOCATIONS
Fergus, Elora  (Head Office) - Waterloo - Cambridge - Kitchener - Guelph - Ottawa - Brampton - Listowel - Drayton - Mount Forest - Arthur

profile:
First established in 1980, ProMark Window Film & Blinds Inc. has established a tradition of providing quality window coverings to customers throughout Southern Ontario.
We help contractors by offering competitive pricing, with prompt and quality installation of our product. We service southern Ontario for commercial window film and blinds, including interior frosting and computer plotted graphics.
